title: Intermediate Course on Knowledge Flow Organization Management and e-Learning Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course focused on building e-learning systems enabling real-time collaboration and knowledge sharing in smartphone-centric constrained environments, aiming to enhance research data management and educational content creation skills in science fields

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply the four stages (discovery-classification-processing-distribution) of the knowledge circulation process in an integrated e-learning environment.
Learners will be able to share science-related content in standardized data formats across organizations using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Learners will be able to improve the efficiency of e-learning content frameworks by over 20% based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
